text: Dar haqiqat pes az musrikon axli kuffor niz ʙar pajomʙaronason va ʙaroi rad kardani on ci az da'vati haq ovarda ʙudand, hilavu najranghoro ʙa kor ʙurdand. Pas, farmoni Alloh darrasid va on ʙinohojasonro az poja vajron soxt va saqf az ʙoloi sarason furu aftod va azoʙi Alloh az coe, ki fikrasro namekardand, ʙa onon rasid, ʙalki gumoni on dostand, ki komilan dar amonand
